title: Kiss The Rings Champions T-Shirt
features: DESIGNED IN THE USA: All of our tees are designed in New England and printed and shipped within the US. All of our apparel is printed on high-quality machines with water-based eco-friendly inks. The inks we use are machine washable and will not come off in the washing machine

CLASSIC UNISEX PERFECT FIT: Our lightweight t-shirt is a comfy, unisex, short-sleeved, crewneck with a relaxed fit that looks great on almost everyone. We offer a range of sizes from S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL & 4XL. Wear it to work out at the gym, relax at home, or out to the bar!

FABRIC TYPE: 100% Ring-Spun, pre-shrunk jersey and is constructed of soft, comfortable materials that will last for years with casual wear. Tagless or tear off neck label. Machine wash cold and tumble dry recommended for longer lasting prints.

GREAT GIFTS: Give your loved ones a gift that theyâ€™ll not only love but wear proudly and passionately. Our creative designs from our staff here in New England and are suitable for any man or woman that can appreciate fun & creative art. Our unique tees are sure to please anyone!

ABOUT CHOWDAHEADZ: Chowdaheadz is a brand that creates unique hiqh quality items that make great gifts or to spoil yourself. We focus on the passion, the history, and the pride of different lifestyles & regions. Established in 2004, and located just North of Boston our team is focused on lighthearted lifestyle based apparel and products, fast shipping, and customer satisfaction.
description: Boston and New England are known for their rings and this t-shirt shows that we wear them with pride! The t-shirt that inspired the famous ESPN magazine cover is one of our all-time best sellers.When your city has victories in all four major sports in seven years, it's safe to say you have a decade of dominance! Boston is the only city in history to wear all these rings at once. Get this tee now to celebrate the greatest era in sports history. Be a champion in style with this Kiss The Rings T-Shirt. This tee is perfect for any New England sports fan. It features a print of all the championship rings won by New England teams. You'll be sure to show your New England pride wherever you go in this stylish t-shirt.
